front.title: Broadband Network UP-Specific Information Suboption for the DHCP Relay Agent Option

abstract.t: This document defines a new Broadband Network UP-Specific Information suboption for the Dynamic Host Configuration Protocolâ€™s (DHCP) relay agent information option. The suboption allows the DHCP relay agent (Broadband Network CP) to include UP-specific information in the DHCP messages it forwards, to ensure that subscribers within the same SGRP under the same UP are assigned IP addresses from the same address space by the DHCP server.
